bibl.title: The Formation of Q: Trajectories in Ancient Wisdom Collections. Second Edition. (Studies in Antiquity and Christianity.)
bibl.note: 1st Ed.: Philadelphia, 1987. - 1. Introduction. - 2. The Document Q. - 3. The Composition of Q. - 4. The Announcement of Judgement of Q. - 5. Sapiential Speeches in Q. - 6. The Temptation Story in Q. - 7. Q and Ancient Sayings Collections. - 8. Conclusion. - Appendices. Bibliography. Index. - Based among others on the testimony of P. Oxy. IV, 655 (= van Haelst 595).
KLOPPENBORG John S., The Formation of Q: Trajectories in Ancient Wisdom Collections. Second Edition. (Studies in Antiquity and Christianity.)
Harrisburg, Pennsylvania, Trinity Press International, 2000, 8Â°, xxii-377 pp. et pll. ISBN 1-56338-306-3. $29.
